attributes.action: Hold a reforendom to let the people of scotland have a vote on independance.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Hold a reforendom to let the people of scotland have a vote on independance,and a say in what scotland beleves is right for its future.

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Scottish Executive / Welsh Assembly / Northern Ireland Executive as appropriate.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
